name: Survive the Swarm (Game Jam Edition)
description:
*NOTE: The audio doesn't quite sound right in the web build, so if that rally bothers you, i suggest downloading the windows build*

This is my submission to Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. Survive the Swarm is an Infinite wave survival game where you have to try and survive the endless, relentless pursuit of "the swarm".

-= CONTROLS =-

WASD or Left joystick to move

Space or X or A to attack.
